title: Analyzing Neuroanatomical Heterogeneity in HIV-Associated Cognitive Impairment
venue: Conference on Retroviruses and Opportunistic Infections (CROI)
description: Presenting three distinct neuroanatomical subtypes of PWH that significantly differ in neuroanatomical atrophy patterns, HIV biomarkers, cognitive function, and their longitudinal trajectories, demonstrating high potential for mapping neurological heterogeneity for PLWH.
